amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of Secretarial Order 3289, issued by the Secretary of the Interior on September 14, 2009, and addressing the impacts of climate change on America's water, land, and other natural and cultural resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A088) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 233 (Roll no. 471).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A088) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 233 (Roll no. 471).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A088) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
